data.title: Emmanuel De Bauw on LinkedIn: #belgium #nato #spaak #harmel #wearenato
data.meta_description:
🙏🏻 Thank you Commandant of the NATO Defense College in Rome, General Olivier Rittimann, for your warm welcome!
🇧🇪 #Belgium fully supports your teaching…
data.text:
🔥 Exceptional, moving and inspiring #show of #artworks by #LouiseBourgeois at the Galleria Borghese in #Rome: from extremely delicate #marble and #bronze #sculptures to fascinating “cells” and #textile creations, and of course a spider… A wonderful tribute to Louise Bourgeois, her journey through memory, her decisive contribution to #ContemporaryArt and her close links with #Italy and Italian #art! 🙏🏻 Grazie mille to #GalleriaBorghese Director Francesca Cappelletti and Curatorial Assistant Anastasia Diaz della Vittoria. 👉🏻 More info: https://lnkd.in/eAaV-wha #ArtIsLife

🇮🇹🍻🇧🇪 Delighted to welcome Italian and Belgian brewers and specialised journalists in celebrating the excellence in the art of #brewing with experts of the Brussels Beer Challenge: - Sharing our #beer culture and knowledge is part of #Belgium’s DNA, - Italian brewers are the second group in importance to be awarded medals at the annual #Brussels Beer Challenge, - Together we honour our traditions and promote #innovation! 🇮🇹🍻🇧🇪 Lieto di accogliere birrai italiani e belgi e giornalisti specializzati nel celebrare l'eccellenza nell'arte delle #birre con gli esperti del #BrusselsBeerChallenge: 🔹 Condividere la nostra cultura e conoscenza della #birra fa parte del DNA del #Belgio, 🔹 I produttori di birra italiani sono il secondo gruppo per importanza a ricevere medaglie al concorso annuale di #Bruxelles, 🔹 Insieme onoriamo le nostre tradizioni e promuoviamo l'#innovazione! #BelgianBeer #BelgianBeers #SaisonBeer #ArtOfLiving #BeerDiplomacy 🔗 Thomas Costenoble, BECOMEV, Guglielmo Pisana, hub.brussels, Marjolein Delaere, Toerisme Vlaanderen - VISITFLANDERS, Giorgio De Bin, Camera di Commercio Belgo-Italiana | Belgian-Italian Chamber of Commerce, Carlo Dugo, Brasserie Dupont, Belgo Sapiens Brewers, De Dochter van de Korenaar, Birra Mezzopasso, La Collina Trattoria & Birrificio Artigianale, food.be

🇧🇪🇪🇺 A real pleasure to recognise Navy Captain Gilles Colmant’s outstanding contribution to European #security upon ending his term in Rome. 🔹 #Belgium’s Faculty Advisor at the NATO Defense College in the past two years, he coached dozens of military and civilian staff from all #NATO Member and Partner Nations in political-military higher education. 🔹 Until the end of June, he was Force Commander of European-led operation #Agenor, the military track of EMASoH - European Maritime Awareness in the Strait of Hormuz, ensuring freedom of navigation in this strategic region. 🔹 I’m #proud of our military forces, of their #leadership and dedication to #peace and security. I’m very grateful to Navy Captain Colmant for his excellent cooperation with the Belgian Foreign Service, the Embassy of Belgium to Italy and Defence Attaché Colonel Dirk Taffeiren in particular. Congratulations. Best wishes for your next assignment at La Défense headquarters in #Brussels! #WeAreNATO #Defense #Defence #Military #Diplomacy #EMASoH #Gulf 🔗 Hadja Lahbib, Ludivine Dedonder, Max A.L.T. Nielsen, Shawn Leonard, Gonzalo Sanchez Gamboa, SPF Affaires étrangères, Commerce extérieur et Coopération au Développement, Antoine Delcourt, Cynthia Salloum

🇧🇪🇪🇺 #BehindTheScenes | Viktor is finishing his diplomatic training at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Brussels. He contributed to the Belgian Presidency of the Council of the #EuropeanUnion from 1st January to 30th June. We look forward to his joining our team at the Belgian Embassy in Rome after the summer. He’s telling us about his experience below. Congratulations, dear colleague! #diplomacy #Belgium #WorkMotivation #ILoveMyJob 🔗 Viktor Vermeire, SPF Affaires étrangères, Commerce extérieur et Coopération au Développement, Lieven De la Marche, François Hirsch, Marie Bragard

🇪🇺🇧🇪 An honour and a pleasure for us at the Embassy of #Belgium in Rome to have contributed to the dynamic, forward-looking Belgian Presidency of the Council of the European Union 2024! We are committed to advancing further the European integration. We worked hard for the benefit of our fellow citizens: 🔹 Driving forward legislative work, 🔹 Responding to crises, 🔹 Preparing a better future for us all. 🙏🏻 Thanks and 👏🏻 congratulations to all who made this happen, in #Brussels at the Ministry of #ForeignAffairs and at the Permanent Representation to the #EuropeanUnion, and in all Belgian diplomatic missions in the world! #Europe is in our DNA. We’re proud to strengthen the #EU! #EU2024BE 🔗 Hadja Lahbib, SPF Affaires étrangères, Commerce extérieur et Coopération au Développement, Theodora Gentzis, Bernard Quintin, Wouter Detavernier, Hendrik Van de Velde, Berbel Baert, Willem Van de Voorde, Alexandre Brecx, Niels Timmermans, Laurens Soenen, Simon Vanderlinden, Lieven De la Marche, François Hirsch, Katelijn (Kaat) De Nijs, Marie Bragard, Emilia V.

🇧🇪🇪🇺🇮🇹 It was a pleasure to celebrate the results of the Belgian Presidency of the Council of the European Union 2024 in #Italy with #Belgium’s partners and friends in #Milan. United around our European democratic values, #TogetherStronger! 🔹 Grateful to our Italian institutional, corporate, academic and cultural partners for their excellent cooperation, 🔹 Thanks to the colleagues of Wallonie-Bruxelles International (WBI), Departement Kanselarij en Buitenlandse Zaken, Wallonia in Italy, Flanders in Italy and hub.brussels for the excellent work we do together, 🔹 Fabulous show by Belgian circus company Be Flat: beautiful, humorous, convivial, energetic and… so typically Belgian! #EU2024BE #EuropeanUnion 🔗 Hadja Lahbib, SPF Affaires étrangères, Commerce extérieur et Coopération au Développement, Katelijn (Kaat) De Nijs, Emilia V., Flagothier Cecile, Anne Laure Léger, Michele Pili, Marleen Verstreken, Guglielmo Pisana, Federico Scavetta
